recipesJson.description: This is a lemon poundncake cooked to perfection and covered with powdered sugar. I had a pretty good lemon pound cake recipe already but I just got a few of these flavors and wanted to get to try them in a recipe so I wh√¨pped this up and it works I think its pretty good.
